data.name: BARBAR BAR
data.detailed_description:
BARBAR BAR is made completly for virtual reality, supporting HTC Vive and Oculus Rift with Touch controllers.

Gameplay consists of a simple memory game, where the player takes orders from customers in a space bar, and he has to mix drinks as they were requested.
There are 4 levels to beat, where time is the enemy and the player has to mix the drinks fast, before the patience of the customer runs out.

The game was made in 48hour game jam (+ some hours of tweaking for Steam purposes)
You can read more about it here : http://tedigames.sk/system/projects/barbar-bar/

Gameplay consists of a simple memory game, where the player takes orders from customers in a space bar, and he has to mix drinks as they were requested.
There are 4 levels to beat, where time is the enemy and the player has to mix the drinks fast, before the patience of the customer runs out.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 2400 or similar AMD CPU
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: nVidia GTX 980 or AMD R9 FURY
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 3770
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: nVidia GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
